body:
Hey @MatiasCiccone isValid is still working. however we using `proxy` for the `formState` object.

if you retrieve individual form state as below. it should work for it.

`console.log(formState.isValid)`

I will update the doc and then close this issue.
his example was pretty much console.log(formState)

@bluebill1049 please take a look again to the sandbox I updated it with your suggestions. And `isValid` is not `true` until I execute `triggerValidation` or I change all the inputs. Take into consideration that this happens only if you first execute `reset`
https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-reset-forces-all-fields-to-be-changed-p9q8v
I'm pretty sure I have the same issue. Thanks for the codesandbox that isolates this problem.
oh! it's the reset button. sorry i miss that the whole time. i will take a look at this
thanks @krnlde you too :) thanks for verifying the issue
@bluebill1049 @krnlde thanks to both. I really like this library that's why I'm reporting these issues
thanks @MatiasCiccone  keep reporting those issues we can make this lib better and better
